lead_paragraph: The Nascar team owner Chip Ganassi shut down Dario Franchitti’s race team because of a lack of sponsorship. Franchitti, who won the Indianapolis 500 and the IndyCar Series title in 2007, has struggled in his first Nascar season driving Ganassi’s No. 40 Dodge.
